name: MERJ

Info


MERJ is a minimalistic platformer made for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam. You can join to anything of the same colour and reach the exit together. There is a total of 10 levels that progressively get harder and add mechanics. All of the code and 'art' were created by me during the 48hrs, except for the AudioManager. Also I know platformers aren't that unique but this is actually somehow the first time I've made one.

Disclaimer: I've only tested the Windows version and I'm tired so everything is probably broken lol
